mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( board_no, town_no, member_no, board_title, board_content, board_write_date, board_read_count, board_recommend_count, board_enabled ) SELECT SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{townNo}, m.member_no, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, sysdate, 0, 0, 0 FROM member m WHERE m.member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, m.member_nickname AS memberNickname FROM board b JOIN member m ON b.member_No = m.member_No WHERE b.town_no = #{townNo} AND b.board_title LIKE '%' || #{searchName} || '%' ORDER BY b.board_No DESC OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT b.*, m.member_nickname AS memberNickname FROM board b JOIN member m ON b.member_No = m.member_No WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
select count(town_no) from board where town_no > 0
mapper.update: update board set board_read_count=board_read_count+1 where board_no = #{boardNo}
update board set board_title = #{boardTitle} , board_content = #{boardContent} where board_no = #{boardNo}
